text: The 1996 Primera B de Chile was the 45th completed season of the Primera B de Chile. Deportes La Serena (tournament’s champion) alongside Deportes Puerto Montt were promoted to 1997 Primera División de Chile season after finishing in the first and second places respectively. ==League table== == Top scorers == {| class="wikitable" width=70% |- bgcolor=#006699 ! colspan=2 align=center | Player ! colspan=1 align=center | Goals ! colspan=1 align=center | Team |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Sergio Salgado||27||Cobresal |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Ruben Dundo||18||Arturo Fernández Vial |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Richard Alvares||15||Deportes Iquique |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Mario Araya||13||Deportes La Serena |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Alejandro Chilindrón||13||Rangers |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Francisco Pinto||13||Deportes La Serena |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Luis Zambrano||13||Ñublense |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Alberto Arzubialde||12||Deportes Arica |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Juan Luis Cerón||12||Colchagua |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Pascual de Gregorio||12||Rangers |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Manuel Neira||12||Everton |- align=center style="background:#F5FAFF;" | align=center |||align=left|Fernando Martel||12||Unión San Felipe |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Walter Otta||12||Deportes Puerto Montt |- align=center style="background:#D0E7FF;" | align=center |||align=left|Eugenio Poblete||12||Arturo Fernández Vial |} ==References== ==External links== * RSSSF 1996 Category:Primera B de Chile seasons Primera B Chil
